about_the_game:
How to Play
This is a choice-based visual novel game where you progress by clicking to read the text and making choices.

Game Features
Genre: Mystery x Sci-Fi
Choices: Multiple endings based on your choices
Playtime: Approximately 10 hours
Voice: No plans for voice acting

Story
In recent years, genetic research has led to the creation of beastmen.
This is a world where humans and beastmen coexist.
"Naoshi Umemura," a university student, takes on a part-time job at a remote hotel run by relatives.
And, it's a hotel exclusively for beastmen...?
An event unfolds on a night when everyone is asleep...
Whether you can safely return from the hotel depends on your choices.
